702288f-a.title: Brooklyn: 3rd Avenue - 27th Street
702288f-a.text:
3rd Avenuew Borth from 27th Street.
P. L. 'perr  April 21, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS

702682f-b.title: Brooklyn: 27th Street - 3rd Avenue
702682f-b.text:
27th Street, north side, east from Third Avenue. The houses in
the foreground were later torn down for the construction of Gowannus
Parkway, a ltnk in the Belt Parkway system. View 2 shows tte same
site after the corner buildings were razed. Note the W. P. A. of'ice
on the left.
View 1: July 21, 1940
View 2: October 18, 1940
P. L. Sperr  Vi e Sg  .SN T N607
NO REPRODUCTIONS

702287f-b.title: Brooklyn: 3rd Avenue - 27th Street
702287f-b.text:
3rd Avenue, at the S. E. corner of 27th Street. These build-
ings were raxed later in the year to make possible the widening of
the avenue and its incorporation into the Belt Parkway. The tracks
afe on Third Avenue.
July 21, 1940
